url.title: URL
url.description: The URL of the CSW server.

getRecordsTemplate.title: Get records template
getRecordsTemplate.description: The template XML string to POST to the CSW server to query for catalog items.  If this property is undefined,CswCatalogGroup.defaultGetRecordsTemplate is used.  The XML string should have a `{startPosition}` placeholder to bereplaced with the next start position in order to allow incremental paging of results.

includeWms.title: Include WMS
includeWms.description: True to allow WMS resources to be added to the catalog; otherwise, false.

includeKml.title: Include KML
includeKml.description: True to allow KML resources to be added to the catalog; otherwise, false.

includeCsv.title: Include CSV
includeCsv.description: True to allow CSV resources to be added to the catalog; otherwise, false.

includeEsriMapServer.title: Include esri map server
includeEsriMapServer.description: True to allow ESRI Map resources to be added to the catalog; otherwise, false.

includeGeoJson.title: Include geo JSON
includeGeoJson.description: True to allow GeoJSON resources to be added to the catalog; otherwise, false.

domainSpecification.title: Domain specification
domainSpecification.description: A description of a domain that will be pulled from the CSW service and used to define the metadataGroups. The domain is obtained by querying the CSW server for a particular property - the values of the property form the domain, the values are assumed to define a hierarchy eg. Wave Models | Wave Energy Flux - which is a two level hierarchy of groups that will be used to classify metadata records.

includeWps.title: Include wps
includeWps.description: True to allow OGC:WPS service resources to be added to the catalog; otherwise, false.

itemProperties.title: Item properties
itemProperties.description: A hash of properties that will be set on the item created from the CKAN resource.For example, { "treat404AsError": false }
